name: gigantically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in an extremely large way: Their influence will increase gigantically in the future. It is a gigantically profitable corporation. See
gigantic
More examplesFewer examplesWhen Mailer failed, he failed giganticallyHe helped to turn stand-up comedy into a gigantically popular art form.I felt that no matter how hard I could work, it would always be gigantically eclipsed by him.
